scripts.prepack:build: pnpm -C apps/web build && pnpm -C apps/server build
scripts.win:build-exe: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true})" && pnpm dlx pkg@5.8.1 -t node18-win-x64 -o dist/Chaoxing.exe . --assets "node_modules/**/*" --assets "node_modules/.pnpm/**/*" --assets "apps/server/build/**/*" --assets "apps/web/dist/**/*" --assets "apps/server/src/configs/**/*" --assets "apps/server/src/env.json" --assets "apps/server/node_modules/http-errors/**/*" --assets "apps/server/node_modules/statuses/**/*"
scripts.win:build-exe-with-rebuild: pnpm run prepack:build && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true})" && pnpm dlx pkg@5.8.1 -t node18-win-x64 -o dist/Chaoxing.exe . --assets "node_modules/**/*" --assets "node_modules/.pnpm/**/*" --assets "apps/server/build/**/*" --assets "apps/web/dist/**/*" --assets "apps/server/src/configs/**/*" --assets "apps/server/src/env.json" --assets "apps/server/node_modules/http-errors/**/*" --assets "apps/server/node_modules/statuses/**/*"
scripts.win:build-exe-no-manifest: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist',{recursive:true})" && pnpm dlx pkg@5.8.1 -t node18-win-x64 -o dist/Chaoxing.exe . --assets "apps/server/build/**/*" --assets "apps/server/node_modules/**/*" --assets "apps/server/node_modules/koa-compose/**/*" --assets "apps/server/node_modules/@koa/router/**/*" --assets "apps/web/dist/**/*" --assets "apps/server/src/configs/**/*" --assets "apps/server/src/env.json"
